name: Space Race (Wi11owwo1f)
description: I made Space Race as a final project.  I just thought I'd put it out here, and see if people enjoyed it.  It's a bit similar to Elite, and I didn't make any of the sprites.  Take on missions, fight off pirates, keep your ship fueled up and maintained, and hope the various bugs don't end your game.  Hopefully you can enjoy it!
